availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elijah Lyle Waller (Union County, Kentucky, clerk)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, clerk. Union County native. Married to Emily A. Berry on January 15, 1857. Clerk in Union County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union, District 2, p. 514A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, file #000562203.
Find A Grave, "Elijah Lyle Waller (August 9, 1829-August 1, 1864)," Memorial #103747885, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/103747885 (accessed May 11, 2018).
